Content:
As I happened to see this funny pic in the internet today, I thought why not nib-away some thoughts! So here's my two pences on the the coin of modern technology. 

In today’s hyper-connected world, humans are deeply intertwined with technology. Whether we realize it or not, we've become inseparable from our devices, from the moment we wake up to the second we fall asleep. The irony is undeniable: while we remain hooked to our machines, they’re learning from us—growing smarter, more efficient, and potentially more powerful than we ever imagined.
Author: Unknown Author
